contents: I will start by moving to the right to align with the purple door, then I will instruct Agent1 to move to the right to be in the same row as the purple door. Once Agent1 is in position, I will instruct them to open the purple door using the purple key. After the door is open, I will move forward to check if the box is behind the door and pick it up to accomplish the mission. I will also instruct Agent1 to follow me and provide support in case any additional actions are required to complete the mission.
